verses.verse: And <WG2532> the <WG3588> third <WG5154> day <WG2250> there was <WG1096> a marriage <WG1062> in <WG1722> Cana <WG2580> of Galilee; <WG1056> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> mother <WG3384> of Jesus <WG2424> was <WG2258> there: <WG1563>
And <WG1161> both <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> was called, <WG2564> and <WG2532> his <WG846> disciples, <WG3101> to <WG1519> the <WG3588> marriage. <WG1062>
And <WG2532> when they wanted <WG5302> wine, <WG3631> the <WG3588> mother <WG3384> of Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto <WG4314> him, <WG846> They have <WG2192> no <WG3756> wine. <WG3631>
Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto her, <WG846> Woman, <WG1135> what have I to do with thee? <WG5101> <WG1698> <WG2532> <WG4671> mine <WG3450> hour <WG5610> is not yet <WG3768> come. <WG2240>
His <WG846> mother <WG3384> saith <WG3004> unto the <WG3588> servants, <WG1249> Whatsoever <WG3748> <WG302> he saith <WG3004> unto you, <WG5213> do <WG4160> it.

And <WG1161> there were <WG2258> set <WG2749> there <WG1563> six <WG1803> waterpots <WG5201> of stone, <WG3035> after <WG2596> the <WG3588> manner of the purifying <WG2512> of the <WG3588> Jews, <WG2453> containing <WG5562> two <WG1417> or <WG2228> three <WG5140> firkins <WG3355> apiece. <WG303>
Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto them, <WG846> Fill <WG1072> the <WG3588> waterpots <WG5201> with water. <WG5204> And <WG2532> they filled <WG1072> them <WG846> up to <WG2193> the brim. <WG507>
And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> unto them, <WG846> Draw out <WG501> now, <WG3568> and <WG2532> bear <WG5342> unto the <WG3588> governor of the feast. <WG755> And <WG2532> they bare <WG5342> it.

<WG1161> When <WG5613> the <WG3588> ruler of the feast <WG755> had tasted <WG1089> the <WG3588> water <WG5204> that was made <WG1096> wine, <WG3631> and <WG2532> knew <WG1492> not <WG3756> whence <WG4159> it was: <WG2076> (but <WG1161> the <WG3588> servants <WG1249> which drew <WG501> the <WG3588> water <WG5204> knew;) <WG1492> the <WG3588> governor of the feast <WG755> called <WG5455> the <WG3588> bridegroom, <WG3566>

And <WG2532> saith <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Every <WG3956> man <WG444> at the beginning <WG4412> doth set forth <WG5087> good <WG2570> wine; <WG3631> and <WG2532> when <WG3752> men have well drunk, <WG3184> then <WG5119> that which is worse: <WG1640> but thou <WG4771> hast kept <WG5083> the <WG3588> good <WG2570> wine <WG3631> until <WG2193> now. <WG737>

This <WG5026> beginning <WG746> of miracles <WG4592> did <WG4160> Jesus <WG2424> in <WG1722> Cana <WG2580> of Galilee, <WG1056> and <WG2532> manifested forth <WG5319> his <WG848> glory; <WG1391> and <WG2532> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> believed <WG4100> on <WG1519> him. <WG846>

After <WG3326> this <WG5124> he went down <WG2597> to <WG1519> Capernaum, <WG2584> he, <WG846> and <WG2532> his <WG846> mother, <WG3384> and <WG2532> his <WG846> brethren, <WG80> and <WG2532> his <WG846> disciples: <WG3101> and <WG2532> they continued <WG3306> there <WG1563> not <WG3756> many <WG4183> days. <WG2250>
And <WG2532> the <WG3588> Jews' <WG2453> passover <WG3957> was <WG2258> at hand, <WG1451> and <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> went up <WG305> to <WG1519> Jerusalem, <WG2414>

And <WG2532> found <WG2147> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> temple <WG2411> those that sold <WG4453> oxen <WG1016> and <WG2532> sheep <WG4263> and <WG2532> doves, <WG4058> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> changers of money <WG2773> sitting: <WG2521>

And <WG2532> when he had made <WG4160> a scourge <WG5416> of <WG1537> small cords, <WG4979> he drove <WG1544> them all <WG3956> out of <WG1537> the <WG3588> temple, <WG2411> and <WG5037> the <WG3588> sheep, <WG4263> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> oxen; <WG1016> and <WG2532> poured out <WG1632> the <WG3588> changers' <WG2855> money, <WG2772> and <WG2532> overthrew <WG390> the <WG3588> tables; <WG5132>

And <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto them that sold <WG4453> doves, <WG4058> Take <WG142> these things <WG5023> hence; <WG1782> make <WG4160> not <WG3361> my <WG3450> Father's <WG3962> house <WG3624> a house <WG3624> of merchandise. <WG1712>

And <WG1161> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> remembered <WG3415> that <WG3754> it was <WG2076> written, <WG1125> The <WG3588> zeal <WG2205> of thine <WG4675> house <WG3624> hath eaten me up. <WG2719> <WG3165>

Then <WG3767> answered <WG611> the <WG3588> Jews <WG2453> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him, <WG846> What <WG5101> sign <WG4592> showest <WG1166> thou unto us, <WG2254> seeing that <WG3754> thou doest <WG4160> these things? <WG5023>

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto them, <WG846> Destroy <WG3089> this <WG5126> temple, <WG3485> and <WG2532> in <WG1722> three <WG5140> days <WG2250> I will raise it up. <WG1453> <WG846>

Then <WG3767> said <WG2036> the <WG3588> Jews, <WG2453> Forty and six <WG5062> <WG2532> <WG1803> years <WG2094> was this temple in building, <WG3618> <WG3778> <WG3485> and <WG2532> wilt thou <WG4771> rear it up <WG1453> <WG846> in <WG1722> three <WG5140> days? <WG2250>
But <WG1161> he <WG1565> spake <WG3004> of <WG4012> the <WG3588> temple <WG3485> of his <WG848> body. <WG4983>

When <WG3753> therefore <WG3767> he was risen <WG1453> from <WG1537> the dead, <WG3498> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> remembered <WG3415> that <WG3754> he had said <WG3004> this <WG5124> unto them; <WG846> and <WG2532> they believed <WG4100> the <WG3588> Scripture, <WG1124> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> which <WG3739> Jesus <WG2424> had said. <WG2036>

Now <WG1161> when <WG5613> he was <WG2258> in <WG1722> Jerusalem <WG2414> at <WG1722> the <WG3588> passover, <WG3957> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> feast <WG1859> day, many <WG4183> believed <WG4100> in <WG1519> his <WG846> name, <WG3686> when they saw <WG2334> the <WG3588> miracles <WG4592> which <WG3739> he did. <WG4160>
But <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> did not <WG3756> commit <WG4100> himself <WG1438> unto them, <WG846> because he <WG846> knew <WG1097> all <WG3956> men,

And <WG2532> <WG3754> needed <WG2192> <WG5532> not <WG3756> that <WG2443> any <WG5100> should testify <WG3140> of <WG4012> man: <WG444> for <WG1063> he <WG846> knew <WG1097> what <WG5101> was <WG2258> in <WG1722> man. <WG444>
